a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Distribution of income across richer and poorer groups, United States, 1974
The share of income received by different income groups – in this case in subgroups of 20% of the population.
Source: World Bank Poverty and Inequality Platform (2022)
Note: Depending on the country and year, the data relates to income measured after taxes and benefits, or to consumption, per capita.
